description: Welcome to Accounts Information API. Initially, you need to create a sandbox, by replacing the sandbox id with a unique id. To create a sandbox, you need an access token.

security.description: A guid that uniquely identifies your application
security.name: Client-Id

description: In this part of the API, you can retrieve information about a specified logged-in user. In addition, you will obtain your user id and the phone number where the OTP will be sent. To successfully collect information, you have to provide your sandbox id, your access token, and a random UUID.

security.name: Client-Id

description: In this part of the API, you can get a list of NBG accounts in the Euro currency. Besides, you will have access to details like your IBAN, your account currency, your account type, and much more information. You need to provide your sandbox id, your access token, your consent id, and a random UUID.

    "payload": [

description: Finally, feel free to retrieve a standing orders list of your NBG account. As a result, you will receive information like a revoke date, your credit account number, your total payments, and many more briefings. All you need to do is to provide your sandbox id, your access token, your consent id, and a random UUID.
